scripts.build:js: terser ./src/js/BorderPaint.js -c -m toplevel -o ./docs/js/BorderPaint.js && terser ./src/js/ButtonPaint.js -c -m toplevel -o ./docs/js/ButtonPaint.js && terser ./src/js/index.mjs -c -m --module -o ./docs/js/index.mjs && terser ./src/js/contFactory.mjs -c -m --module -o ./docs/js/contFactory.mjs && terser ./src/js/loadSW.mjs -c -m --module -o ./docs/js/loadSW.mjs && terser ./src/js/portFactory.mjs -c -m --module -o ./docs/js/portFactory.mjs && terser ./worker.js -c -m toplevel -o ./docs/worker.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./docs && mkdir docs && cd ./docs && mkdir js && cd ../
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && cp -r ./src/images ./docs/images && cp ./src/manifest.webmanifest ./docs/manifest.webmanifest && npm run snowpack
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:sass && npm run build:js
